body.name: Security Camera Indoor-2K 360° WiFi Cameras for Home Security，Pet/Dog/Baby Camera with Phone app, 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, 24/7 SD Card Storage, Works with Alexa & Google Home (2.4Ghz)-D1
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 40 mins
features: [Crystal 2K Resolution & 360° Monitoring] Cinnado indoor security camera provides super clear 2K FHD live stream which allows you to monitor your pets or babies in clear details. With pan and tilt functions, 360° Coverage on your phone to remotely control the indoor camera and monitor every corner of your home in real time. The pet camera is equipped with 4 940nm IR lights, you can clearly see your baby and pets every move even at night.

[Smart Motion Detection & Push Notifications] This home security camera is equipped with Siren and motion sensor, whether you are at home or not, you can receive an instant alert message on your phone when motion is detected and scare off the uninvited guest by the alarm Siren. The indoor camera will automatically record 10s video clips and save on app when the motion is detected, so you will not miss any essential movements.

[Smooth 2-Way Audio & Multiple Users] Cinnado cameras for home security indoor have a built-in microphone and speaker that allows you to talk to your family and pets through the App. Even if you are not at home, you can easily communicate with your children or pets through the camera. Camera for home also supports create multiple family accounts and share the camera with family and friends, with 2K clear image, enjoy the convenience that baby camera brings you!

[Optional Cloud & 24/7 continuous Recording] This security indoor camera supports SD card storage and cloud storage. It supports 24/7 continuous recording with SD card (up to 128GB), which can record every detail for you. You can also choose cloud storage to record important moments for you, but it's not mandatory. Cinnado indoor camera offers you a 30-day free trial of cloud storage. You can choose your favorite way for your home security camera to record your happy moments!

[Work with Alexa and Google Assistant & Lifelong Support] The indoor camera is compatible with Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant. Pair the Cinnado wifi camera with Alexa or Google Assistant, then use a simple voice command to ask Alexa or Google Assistant to view your live camera feed. Easily display your home security footage on a larger screen! Cinnado also provides lifelong technical support and after-sales service to our customers, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great camera! Bought a second one for my friends new baby!
reviews.reviewText: I recently got the Cinnado Security Camera Indoor-2K, and I've got to say, it's an absolute gem! The 2K resolution is stunning – the clarity and detail are just impressive. It's perfect for keeping a watchful eye over my home, pets, and even as a baby monitor.One of the coolest features is the 360° rotation. I can literally see every nook and cranny of the room, and controlling it through the phone app is a breeze. The app itself is user-friendly, making the whole experience quite enjoyable.Integration with Alexa and Google Home adds to its charm, making it a perfect fit for my smart home setup. The night vision capability is another highlight. It provides crystal clear images even in low light, which is super reassuring.The 2-way audio feature is fantastic. The sound quality is great, and it’s fun interacting with my pets while I’m away. Plus, it's quite handy for quick communication with family at home.Setting it up was straightforward and quick. Once it’s running, it’s really low maintenance but high performance.In summary, if you're looking for a reliable, high-quality indoor security camera, the Cinnado Security Camera Indoor-2K is a superb choice. It’s affordable, efficient, and a great addition to any home looking for that extra bit of security and connectivity. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy set up, great picture, nice features!
reviews.reviewText: I was very impressed with this camera. The setup was very easy and the picture was very clear as it's 2k resolution. The app has a lot of features, allowing control over the camera's position, alerts, access to stored videos and snapshots, etc. I was a little confused about where the SD card went, but soon found the slot just beneath the actual camera lens. This allows local storage of video for the longer term as opposed to using the included time-limited cloud storage.All-in-all, I was impressed with this camera's capabilities, clarity, and price point. I think it is an excellent value and a good choice for corded camera use cases.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good, very clear and easy to use cameras
reviews.reviewText: This four pack of cameras have exceeded my expectations. My review has 2 photos of the box of all 4 cameras inside and out, photo of a single camera and all pieces you will need to install a single camera, photo of the camera installed inverted on the ceiling, and lastly 2 photos from the camera itself.I ended up using nano tape to install on the ceiling and not the mount with the screws so I didn't have to put a hole in the ceiling and that works fine also the camera is very lightweight and the nanotape I use is very strong. If you mount the camera in the middle of an entryway between two rooms you can view both rooms entirely.The night vision on this camera works very well you can see very good with very little light, there is also an option to turn the infrared light vision off completely if you have another light source at night and the camera stay color with that option.The daytime view is crisp and clear way better than I expected for a camera of this price, The last two photos of my review are screenshots from the camera app itself you can see for yourself the clarity. The wansview app allows pre saved location so you don't have to move the camera manual every time you can have kitchen living, room hallway, etc and the camera will go to the pre set location on the push of a button. The camera picks up a very wide area and rotates almost 360° around, if you mount it on the ceiling like I have you can pretty much pick up every part of the room. If you're using it to watch your pets you will not be disappointed, The response when moving the camera remotely is pretty fast also better than the other brand cameras I've used.This camera takes up to 128 GB SD card which you can view the footage from the wansview app locally or remotely without taking the SD card out or even touching the camera. There are many different cameras to choose from these days but you will not be disappointed with this one for indoor security or monitoring. To set up of this camera is easy also you just download the wansview cloud app, Enter your network login details, then you will get a QR code you just point your phone screen at the camera and it will scan the QR code and then it's installed instantly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Camera HD video and easy to setup in app!
reviews.reviewText: I really liked this camera. I have purchased several of the Wansview and Cinnado line lately and have installed quite a few. Camera works great and seemless in the Wansview app.Easy to connect (Alexa compatible)no local storageexcellent images in HD (SD is very good too)Excellent video, Sound is good and motion is smooth.This is my favorite indoor PTZ camera so far, not only is it exactly as described, but there are a few nice surprises they didn't mention. When I started looking for this type of camera, it was really difficult to make a decision based on reviews and had to try several until I found one that worked the way I wanted. If I had started with this camera I would have bought more. You can buy cheaper cameras, but after all the $20 cameras that were far below par, this camera is well worth it. I will definitely be buying more of these for myself and as gifts

Cámara muy buena y relación calidad-precio de 10. La visión es genial tanto de día como de noche, buena estabilidad y giro y audio bidireccional. La alerta de movimiento funciona muy bien y permite hacer una imagen o un vídeo de 10 segundos y la cámara se configura en un par de minutos. Compré dos y después de probarlas durante unas semanas estoy súper contenta con ellas. La única pega es que no puedo ver la cámara desde el teléfono con la app de Alexa, solamente en la app propia de la cámara, pero funciona muy bien.

The media could not be loaded. ho installato la camera da una settimana circa e posso dire che :- è facile da installare e configurare con l app wansview dove si ha la possibilità di attivare o disattivare le varie opzioni come il rilevamento del movimento , allarme movimento, luce e visione notturna ..- la camera ha la possibilità di impostare visione standard oppure a 2k .. quest' ultima modalità rende la visione molto nitida e di ottima qualità,. allegate vedete le stesse immagini in standard e 2k .. si nota bene la qualità superiore in 2k- visione notturna molto buona e chiara- colori ottimi- accesso da app immediato e semplice- la camera è ruotabile mezzo comando da app che ti permette di avere una visione a 270 gradi dell ambiente cui è installata- l audio è bidirezionale e si sente bene- può esser fissata mezzo supporto e viti in dotazionein definitiva per il costo da sosteneree le caratteristiche del dispositivo direi che è un ottimo acquisto

Die Indoor-Kamera habe ich jetzt seit 4 Wochen und bin absolut begeistert von den gebotenen Funktionen und der Gesamtleistung.Benutzerfreundlichkeit :Die Einrichtung war total Easy , dank der gut strukturierten App. Die Benutzeroberfläche ist äußerst intuitiv gestaltet, und alle Funktionen sind leicht zugänglich. Die klare Anleitung hat es mir leicht gemacht mich zurecht zu finden.Bild- und Videoqualität :Die Kamera liefert top Bilder und Videos in HD-Qualität, sowohl tagsüber als auch bei schlechten Lichtverhältnissen. Die Nachtsichtfunktion überzeugt durch ihre Klarheit und Reichweite.Funktionsvielfalt :Von der zuverlässigen Bewegungserkennung bis zum Zwei-Wege-Audio – die Kamera bietet eine beeindruckende Palette von Funktionen. Die Echtzeitbenachrichtigungen bei Bewegung sind besonders hilfreich.Verbindungsstabilität :Die Verbindung zwischen Kamera und App ist stabil, ohne Verzögerungen oder Verbindungsabbrüche. Selbst bei schwächerem WLAN-Signal arbeitet die Kamera zuverlässig.Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis :Angesichts der gebotenen Funktionen und der Qualität halte ich das Preis-Leistungs-Verhältnis für sehr gut.Fazit:Die D1 2K Indoor Securitiy Camera ist eine super Wahl für alle, die eine zuverlässige Indoor-Überwachungslösung suchen. Die Kombination aus exzellenter Bildqualität, benutzerfreundlicher App und vielfältigen Funktionen macht sie zu einem klaren Favoriten. Ich kann sie jedem empfehlen würde sie immer wieder kaufen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Une excellente camera à un prix abordable
reviews.reviewText: Très bonne petite caméra d’intérieur à un prix abordable. J’ai été surpris par la qualité des images (jour et nuit). Plusieurs points positifs :- Le prix bien entendu, bon rapport qualité prix.- Produit bien emballé avec tous ses accessoires- La simplicité d’installation et d’utilisation, notice claire et en Français- L’image est assez nette, résolution 2K de très bonne qualité (excellente vision nocturne)- Possibilité de partager le visionnage de la camera avec une autre personne en utilisant l’app sur le téléphone mobile.- Possibilité de définir une zone de confidentialité avec l’app de la caméra.- Possibilité de stocker les enregistrements sur un NAS local, sur le cloud ou par SD.- Possibilité de déclencher une sirène à distance pour faire fuir d’éventuel cambrioleursBref, c’est vraiment top !Point négatif que je note :Améliorer la détection de mouvement que je trouve un peu sensible, mais peut-être un souci de réglage de ma part.La non compatibilité avec le wifi 5Ghz, mais rare sont aujourd’hui les caméras qui utilisent du wifi 5Ghz. La bande 2Ghz permet aussi d’avoir une connexion correcte et stable sur cette caméra.En conclusion, je recommande cette caméra, bon rapport qualité prix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Very good value, does a great job
reviews.reviewText: Setup was very quick, within about 2 minutes I had the camera setup and my preferred settings all plugged in. The cable is a good length so most users would probably have no issues reaching a plug socket. The shape of the camera is also good - some other models are too heavy and fall over quite easily, whereas this one is very stable and wouldn’t be easily knocked over by a pet for example.The camera picture is high definition and the IR night vision is extremely clear - an upgrade to the previous indoor cameras I have used. The mic and speaker function also works well and the sound is fairly clear for such a small unit.The ability to move the camera remotely is really useful. I use my indoor cameras to keep an eye on my pets when we are away during the day and if we go on holiday, so being able to move the camera slightly to get a better view is brilliant. It’s nice and quiet, so my pets don’t seem to be bothered if the camera moves next to them. Also the ability to save preset angles just makes this even more user friendly and is a great function to have.No problems using the Wansview app (as I do with other cameras) to view live video, check motion alerts and record footage to a micro SD. Overall easy to use, good value and does a great job for my needs. Really pleased!
